code: import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';import translationEN from'./locales/en/translation.json';import translationFR from'./locales/fr/translation.json';import translationES from'./locales/es/translation.json';const resources={en:{translation:translationEN},fr:{translation:translationFR},es:{translation:translationES}};i18n.use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({resources,fallbackLng:'en',interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
